    "mandatory":[
      "content-security-policy",

      "x-xss-protection",
      "x-content-type-options",
      "feature-policy",
      "date"
    ],
    "optional":[
      "access-control-allow-origin",
      "access-control-allow-methods",
      "access-control-allow-headers",
      "cache-control",
      "content-length",
      "content-type"
    ],
    "avoid":[
      "x-powered-by",
      "x-aspnet-version",
      "via",
      "x-Cache",
      "x-request-id",
      "x-amzd-requestid",
      "date",
      "server",
      "content-type",
      "content-length",
      "cache-control",
      "connection",
      "etag",
      "last-modified",
      "location",
      "set-cookie",
      "expires",
      "access-control-allow-origin",
      "content-encoding",
      "strict-transport-security",
      "x-content-type-options"
    ],
    "deprecated":[
      "p3p",
      "expires",
      "x-frame-options",
      "x-ua-compatible",
      "pragma"
    ]
  }
